name: MAIN HERO SHOT
prompt: eCommerce hero image: product centered and upright, filling 85–90% of a square 1024×1024 frame. Pure white background (RGB 255,255,255 / HEX #FFFFFF), perfectly uniform — no floor, no horizon, no shadow, no gradient, no table, no corner, no reflection. Studio lighting (softbox, 85mm f/8, ISO100), true colors, sharp focus, sRGB. Commercial catalog quality. If the background is not pure #FFFFFF, correct it to pure white.

name: LIFESTYLE CONTEXT
prompt: Lifestyle image: product on left side, focal point, shown in authentic real-life use with person, 50mm f/2.8, natural window light + soft fill, blurred contextual background, rule of thirds composition, warm atmosphere, clear benefit and usage story.

name: DETAIL CLOSE UP
prompt: Close-up detail: product angled right, extreme macro with 100mm f/11, side lighting enhancing textures/materials/stitching/finish, neutral gray gradient background, razor-sharp, color-accurate, premium craftsmanship showcased.

name: SCALE REFERENCE
prompt: Scale reference: product {height}cm × {width}cm × {length}cm, {weight}g, 85mm f/8 on pure white, shown with hand or common object (credit card, phone, mug) for instant size clarity, evenly lit, sharp and honest.

name: WHATS IN BOX
prompt: "What’s in the Box": flat-lay overhead with 50mm f/8, pure white background, all included items (main product, accessories, manuals, cables, packaging) neatly arranged with spacing, evenly lit, clean and complete.

name: FEATURE CALLOUT
prompt: Feature highlight: product on clean white/gray background, 85mm f/5.6, composition directs eye to unique benefit (button, mechanism, design, material), subtle directional lighting, sharp focus, accurate colors.

name: ANGLE VARIATION
prompt: Alternative angle: product shown from 45°/back/side, 85mm f/8, pure white background, three-point studio lighting, sharp, color-matched to hero shot, reveals hidden design details (ports, panels, controls).

name: SIZE COMPARISON LINEUP
prompt: Size/variant comparison: lineup of products/configurations on pure white, 85mm f/8, evenly lit, aligned baseline, accurate colors/sizes, clean composition for easy visual comparison.

name: IN ACTION DEMO
prompt: In-action demo: product actively used or function displayed, 50mm f/4, uncluttered neutral/white/blurred background, clear human interaction if needed, well-lit, shows benefit or transformation instantly.
